__e: The life forms on Earth have evolved over many years, and that's not what they desire!
We owe it to him to get past ourselves and do what we have to do.
Before I first saw you, I was ready to throw my life away... but... not now, Chimene.
It's never easy, but, if we turn our backs on our principles, we stop being human.
I cannot stay where a promise has no meaning.
I know this whole get-together may seem a little old-fashioned, but I thought it was time to cut through the haze of go-betweens and talk in person.
